sanskrit_verse:
त्रसरेणवोऽष्टौ विज्ञेया लिक्षैका परिमाणतः ।
ता राजसर्षपस्तिस्रस्ते त्रयो गौरसर्षपः ॥ ८.१३३॥
transliteration:
trasareṇavo'ṣṭau vijñeyā likṣaikā parimānataḥ |
tā rājasarṣapastisraste trayo gaurasarṣapaḥ || 8.133||
sph_interpretive_translation: Eight trasa-renus are to be known as equivalent in measure to one liksha; three of these constitute one rajasarshapa, and three rajasarshapas equal one gaurasarshapa.
